function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Variability in health and safety risks based on work environment (outdoors vs. enclosed)","Impact":"Increased risk of infection and difficulties in compliance with health and safety guidelines","Mitigation":"Develop specific health and safety guidelines for different work environments and provide necessary resources for compliance","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, contact tracing apps","People":"Workers in different work environments","Owner":"Property managers, contractors"},{"Description":"Interdependent relation between health and the built environment in controlling COVID-19 spread","Impact":"Increased vulnerability of populations and potential for rapid spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols, promote safe work practices, and provide resources for hygiene","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, contactless access control systems","People":"Property/facilities managers, building occupants","Owner":"Property managers, building owners"},{"Description":"Unknown factors in the management of COVID-19 pandemic and its impact on property management","Impact":"Uncertainty in preventive measures and potential for higher risk of infection","Mitigation":"Stay updated with healthcare information, implement immediate preventive steps, and adapt to new guidelines as they are developed","Technologies":"Health information management systems, smart building technologies","People":"Property management industry professionals","Owner":"Property management organizations"}]}
